Mod1_Description: {c_important}Lightning Storm{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%|]{/c} chance to Immobilize enemies hit for {c_number}{buffduration:IMMOBILIZE}{/c} seconds.
Mod2_Description: The size of your {c_important}Lightning Storm{/c} is preserved for {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} seconds after channeling.
name: Lightning Storm
